languages.text: "Я разрешил{mf||а} проблемы в отсеке, однако осталось последнее дело: проследите, чтобы в ближайшем порту Идира Тласс покинула корабль. Я не могу рисковать, оставляя ее в команде".
"I handled the problems in the bay, although there is one matter outstanding: see to it that Idira Tlass leaves the ship at the next port. I cannot risk keeping her in my crew."
languages.original_text: "Я разрешил{mf||а} проблемы в отсеке, однако осталось последнее дело: проследите, чтобы в ближайшем порту Идира Тласс покинула корабль. Я не могу рисковать, оставляя ее в команде".

traits.locale_text: "I handled the problems in the bay, although there is one matter outstanding: see to it that Idira Tlass leaves the ship at the next port. I cannot risk keeping her in my crew."
"I handled the problems in the bay, although there is one matter outstanding: see to it that Idira Tlass leaves the ship at the next port. I cannot risk keeping her in my crew."
"I handled the problems in the bay, although there is one matter outstanding: see to it that Idira Tlass leaves the ship at the next port. I cannot risk keeping her in my crew."
"I handled the problems in the bay, although there is one matter outstanding: see to it that Idira Tlass leaves the ship at the next port. I cannot risk keeping her in my crew."

languages.text: “我已经解决了甲板上的问题，不过还有个问题没有解决：等飞船下次入港的时候，让伊迪拉·特拉斯走人。我不能冒险把她留在船员之中。”
languages.original_text: "I handled the problems in the bay, although there is one matter outstanding: see to it that Idira Tlass leaves the ship at the next port. I cannot risk keeping her in my crew."

traits.locale_text: “我已经解决了甲板上的问题，不过还有个问题没有解决：等飞船下次入港的时候，让伊迪拉·特拉斯走人。我不能冒险把她留在船员之中。”

languages.text: «He solucionado los problemas de la bahía, pero queda un asunto por resolver: asegúrese de que Idira Tlass abandona la nave en el próximo puerto. No puedo arriesgarme a mantenerla en la tripulación».
languages.original_text: "I handled the problems in the bay, although there is one matter outstanding: see to it that Idira Tlass leaves the ship at the next port. I cannot risk keeping her in my crew."

traits.locale_text: «He solucionado los problemas de la bahía, pero queda un asunto por resolver: asegúrese de que Idira Tlass abandona la nave en el próximo puerto. No puedo arriesgarme a mantenerla en la tripulación».

languages.text: 「ベイ内の問題は処理したが、未解決の問題が1件ある。次の港でイディラ・トラスを下船させろ。彼女をクルーに加えておくというリスクは冒せない」
languages.original_text: "I handled the problems in the bay, although there is one matter outstanding: see to it that Idira Tlass leaves the ship at the next port. I cannot risk keeping her in my crew."

traits.locale_text: 「ベイ内の問題は処理したが、未解決の問題が1件ある。次の港でイディラ・トラスを下船させろ。彼女をクルーに加えておくというリスクは冒せない」

languages.text: "Ich habe die Probleme beseitigt, aber eine Angelegenheit steht noch aus: Sorgt dafür, dass Idira Tlass das Schiff im nächsten Hafen verlässt. Ich kann es nicht riskieren, sie in meiner Crew zu belassen."
languages.original_text: "I handled the problems in the bay, although there is one matter outstanding: see to it that Idira Tlass leaves the ship at the next port. I cannot risk keeping her in my crew."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe die Probleme beseitigt, aber eine Angelegenheit steht noch aus: Sorgt dafür, dass Idira Tlass das Schiff im nächsten Hafen verlässt. Ich kann es nicht riskieren, sie in meiner Crew zu belassen."

languages.text: « Je me suis {mf|occupé|occupée} du problème, mais il nous reste un dernier détail à régler : veillez à ce qu'Idira Tlass quitte le vaisseau au port le plus proche. Je ne peux pas prendre le risque de la garder dans l'équipage. »
languages.original_text: "I handled the problems in the bay, although there is one matter outstanding: see to it that Idira Tlass leaves the ship at the next port. I cannot risk keeping her in my crew."

traits.locale_text: « Je me suis {mf|occupé|occupée} du problème, mais il nous reste un dernier détail à régler : veillez à ce qu'Idira Tlass quitte le vaisseau au port le plus proche. Je ne peux pas prendre le risque de la garder dans l'équipage. »

languages.text: "Tüm sorunları çözdüm. Ufak bir mesele var ama: İdira Tlass'ın bir sonraki rıhtımda gemiden inmesini sağlayın. Onu mürettebatımda tutma riskini göze alamam."
languages.original_text: "I handled the problems in the bay, although there is one matter outstanding: see to it that Idira Tlass leaves the ship at the next port. I cannot risk keeping her in my crew."

traits.locale_text: "Tüm sorunları çözdüm ama geriye bir sorun kaldı: İdira Tlass'ın bir sonraki rıhtımda gemiden inmesini sağlayın. Onu mürettebatımda tutma riskini göze alamam."
